channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- glibc
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- glibc

item.title: CVE-2020-1751|2024-08-04T06:46:30.859Z -- red%20hat -- glibc
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability was found in glibc before 2.31 when handling signal trampolines on PowerPC. Specifically, the backtrace function did not properly check the array bounds when storing the frame address, resulting in a denial of service or potential code execution. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.
